verses.verse: Now there was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7436>Ramathaimzophim,<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H453>Elihu,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8459>Tohu,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph,<s%> an <S%H673>Ephrathite:<s%>

And he had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives;<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H2584>Hannah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6444>Peninnah:<s%> and <S%H6444>Peninnah<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3206>children,<s%> but <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3206>children.<s%>

And <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up out of his <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3117>yearly<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> and to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%> And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> <S%H2652>Hophni<s%> and <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> were <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And when the <S%H3117>time<s%> was that <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> <S%H2076>offered,<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H6444>Peninnah<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1121>sons<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H4490>portions:<s%>

But to <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H639>worthy<s%> <S%H4490>portion;<s%> for he <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H2584>Hannah:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5462>shut<s%> up her <S%H7358>womb.<s%>

And her <S%H6869>adversary<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3707>provoked<s%> her <S%H3708>sore,<s%> for to make her <S%H7481>fret,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5462>shut<s%> up her <S%H7358>womb.<s%>

And as he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year,<s%> <S%H1767>when<s%> she <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> she <S%H3707>provoked<s%> her; therefore she <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and did not <S%H398>eat.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> to her, <S%H2584>Hannah,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> you? and <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> you not? and <S%H4100>why<s%> is your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H7489>grieved?<s%> am not I <S%H2896>better<s%> to you than <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons?<s%>

So <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H8354>drunk.<s%> Now <S%H5941>Eli<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> on a <S%H3678>seat<s%> by a <S%H4201>post<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And she was in <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> sore.

And she <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will indeed <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> and <S%H2142>remember<s%> me, and not <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> but will <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H519>handmaid<s%> a <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H2233>child,<s%> then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> him to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life,<s%> and there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4177>razor<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as she <S%H7235>continued<s%> <S%H6419>praying<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H8104>marked<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Now <S%H2584>Hannah,<s%> she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in her <S%H3820>heart;<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> her <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H5128>moved,<s%> but her <S%H6963>voice<s%> was not <S%H8085>heard:<s%> therefore <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H2803>thought<s%> she had been <S%H7910>drunken.<s%>
And <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you be <S%H7937>drunken?<s%> <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> your <S%H3196>wine<s%> from you.

And <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> I am a <S%H802>woman<s%> of a <S%H7186>sorrowful<s%> <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> I have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> but have <S%H8210>poured<s%> out my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H5414>Count<s%> not your <S%H519>handmaid<s%> for a <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial:<s%> for out of the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> and <S%H3708>grief<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%> till <S%H5704>now.<s%> <S%H2008><s%>

Then <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace:<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>grant<s%> you your <S%H7596>petition<s%> that you have <S%H7592>asked<s%> of him.

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> Let your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%> So the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> her <S%H1870>way,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and her <S%H6440>countenance<s%> was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> sad.

And they <S%H7925>rose<s%> up in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to their <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah:<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> her.

Why it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H3117>time<s%> was <S%H8622>come<s%> about after <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> that she <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> saying, <S%H3588>Because<s%> I have <S%H7592>asked<s%> him of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H2076>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H3117>yearly<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and his <S%H5088>vow.<s%>

But <S%H2584>Hannah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> not up; for she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H376>husband,<s%> I will not go up <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> be <S%H1580>weaned,<s%> and then I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him, that he may <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H854>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H6213>Do<s%> what <S%H5869>seems<s%> you <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H3427>tarry<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you have <S%H1580>weaned<s%> him; <S%H389>only<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6965>establish<s%> his <S%H1697>word.<s%> So the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3427>stayed,<s%> and gave her <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3243>suck<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> she <S%H1580>weaned<s%> him.

And <S%H834>when<s%> she had <S%H1580>weaned<s%> him, she <S%H5927>took<s%> him up with her, with <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H7058>flour,<s%> and a <S%H5035>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh:<s%> and the <S%H5288>child<s%> was <S%H5288>young.<s%>
And they <S%H7819>slew<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> to <S%H5941>Eli.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> as your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> I am the <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H5324>stood<s%> by you <S%H2088>here,<s%> <S%H6419>praying<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
For <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5288>child<s%> I <S%H6419>prayed;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me my <S%H7596>petition<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7592>asked<s%> of him:

Therefore <S%H1571>also<s%> I have <S%H7592>lent<s%> him to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> as <S%H3117>long<s%> as he <S%H3117>lives<s%> he shall be <S%H7592>lent<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And he <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
